post.contextTooltip: Choose the context in which you want your post to be published. You can choose between specific exercises and lectures of the course or choose one of the course-wide, more general topics. If you choose an exercise or a lecture, the post will appear in the discussion panel on the exercise or lecture page. If you choose a course-wide topic, the post will only be listed in the overview (discussion tab).
post.fixedContextTooltip: The context of a post can only be changed by a tutor once the post was created.
